summary: My Vampire, Greta, as a follower.  Requires Dawnguard!!!
descriptionHtml:
Backstory:
Greta was born 23 years ago in the Province of Cyrodiil.  At the age of 9, she discovered she was a good marksman.  At the age of 14, she was winning tournaments and could best even the best hunter.  By 19, she was recognized as one of the best marksmen in Cyrodiil, and she was aiming for all of Tamriel.  However, she lost a tournament and got discouraged at the age of 22.

She moved to Skyrim, wandering as a sort of mercenary.  She was attacked by a Vampire who, for some reason, took her to Castle Volkihar.  Harkon killed the man, but spared Greta.  He offered her his blood, and she accepted.

After a three day sleep, she awoke and Harkon taught her how to utilize her power.

Greta spent three months there when she found two unique swords and took up Swordmanship.

She now spends her days in the Bannered Mare in Whiterun, wearing rags.  The official reason is unknown, but she\'s an ally of the Dragonborn and will follow him/her anywhere.

Where she left her swords, no one knows.
((I hope to make this a quest and have her voiced and everything one day.  But I need to learn to script first.))
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Dawnguard IS REQUIRED!! No way around this.

Hello all.  This is my second follower.

I used a different file set up for this one.

She\'s in the Bannered Mare in Whiterun.

Also, when you take the Swords from her, she will equip a bow.  My screen wasn\'t big enough to show the option to take it away, so if someone out there would fix this for me, I would be much obliged.

Instead of uploading pictures of the follower, I will upload pictures of the original character.  They look exactly alike.

I suppose it depends on the situation what she will use.  I haven\'t completely finished testing her.

Changelog:
V1 - Initial

Planned updates:
Fix the neckseam if enough people complain.

Credits
Dimon99 - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709
Ithot - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30411
Apachii - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
SvarogNL - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16731

Recommended:
Female Vampires have Fangs - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22522
If you want her to have fangs.  I highly recommend it.  If you don\'t have this mod and she has fangs, you tell me.
Unbleak - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24828
I use the Unbleak Performance version because I have such a crappy graphics card with no distance blur and no film grain.  I have absolutely no performance drop.
Lustmord Vampire Armor - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25852
Greta, I think, looks best in this.  She might use the crossbow, as her back story states she was an expert with a crossbow at a young age.  If not, I\'ll tweak her traits.
Dread Knight Weapon Set - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15494
It\'s cool, that\'s why...
Dual Wield for followers - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13571
She won\'t dual wield without it.
Less sunken cheeks - http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16506
If you don\'t want those cheeks sunken.  She\'ll use any Chargen you have that affects Vampires.
Covereyes - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4869
If you want her to have the eyes in the pictures.  Otherwise she\'ll use Vanilla eyes.  Or whatever vampire eyes you have installed.  She has the covereyes texture in the pictures because I use Covereyes.

Permissions:
You may NOT upload her to anything.  This is a Nexus exclusive.
You may, however, edit her to your liking and show me.  I may add your version to my mod, giving you due credit.
author: Amor
